text: "Alone" is a 2016 song by American DJ and record producer Marshmello. It was released in May 2016, On June, 17, 2016 it was released as a digital download on iTunes and for streaming on Spotify. It was at number 56 on the Canadian Hot 100 and number 60 on the US Billboard Hot 100. In February 2019, it went to number 28 on the Billboard Hot 100 because Marshmello played a virtual live concert in the video game Fortnite. It is the first and only Monstercat song to be certified Platinum (or higher) by the RIAA. ==Track listing== ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== Chart (2016â€“19) Peak position Argentina (Argentina Hot 100) 86 Australia Digital Tracks (ARIA) 30 Ireland (IRMA) 100 Sweden Heatseeker (Sverigetopplistan) 16 ===Year-end charts=== Chart (2016) Position US Hot Dance/Electronic Songs (Billboard) 26 Chart (2017) Position US Hot Dance/Electronic Songs (Billboard) 59 Chart (2019) Position US Hot Dance/Electronic Songs (Billboard) 42 ==Certifications== ==Release history== Region Date Format Version Label United States May 13, 2016 Digital download Original Monstercat August 25, 2016 Remixes EP ==References== ==Other websites== *Original music video Category:2016 songs Category:Marshmello songs
